question:
Which of the following is / are correct statements about “Adopt a Heritage Scheme”?
  1. It is an initiative under Ministry of Culture
  2. Under this scheme, government has appointed private as well as public companies as “Monument Mitras” to boost heritage tourism in the country
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: <u>First statement is incorrect.</u> The “Adopt a Heritage Scheme” is an initiative under Ministry of Tourism. <u>Second statement is correct.</u> Under this scheme, the government has appointed private as well as public companies as “Monument Mitras” for making heritage tourism more sustainable through conservation and development. The short-listed companies, to be called Monument Mitras, are from various sectors such as hospitality, travel, and banking.
